bibl.title: New Light on the Patermouthis Archive from Excavations at Aswan. When Archaeology and Papyrology Meet. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Recent Archaeological Evidence for the Topography of Late Antique Syene. - 2. The Topographical References in the Patermouthis Archive Reconsidered. - 3. The Findspot of the Patermouthis Archive: Elephantine or Aswan? - Conclusion: The Patermouthis Archive and the Topography of Late Antique Syene.
DIJKSTRA Jitse H.F., New Light on the Patermouthis Archive from Excavations at Aswan. When Archaeology and Papyrology Meet. Avec résumé en anglais.
